REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1452 reute r f BC-PRESIDIO-OIL-<PRS>-BE 04-03 0094

TEXT.TITLE: PRESIDIO OIL <PRS> BEGINS EXCHANGE OFFER
TEXT.BODY: Presidio Oil Co said it began an offer to exchange shares of its recently created class A common stock for shares of its class B common stock on a share-for-share basis. The oil and gas company also said it plans to declare an annual cash dividend of 10 cts a share, payable quarterly, on the class A stock. Though not restricted from doing so, it does not plan to pay cash dividends on the class B common. The exchange offer is on a one-time only basis and will be open for 90 days, it said. Reuter
